Do you know how many cats are slaughtered every year?
Almost 45,000 cats are picked up by shelters...
...and about 20,000 of those cats are slaughtered.
In order to decrease the number of deaths happening every year,...
...you can adopt a cat at a shelter.
Another way to protect these cats is by visiting your local cat cafe.
The money the cat cafe makes goes towards taking care of those cats.
Not only can you protect the cats,...
...you can also pet the cats and play with them while enjoying delicious food.
